author: Ted Byrne
content: That’s the thing about art... Once released into the wild, it’s like a horse who has skipped its traces. It’s owner loses all claims os ownership and control. It’s meaning is entirely in the beholder’s mind.  And when you write, “It would be interesting to...” I am already, even if reluctantly, answering your question... with the imagination you’ve flipped on. That’s precisely what you do daily to us... art is about asking questions, which is what distinguishes from craft, eh?
